benchmark_details.name: RoleTriviaQA
benchmark_details.overview: RoleTriviaQA is a large-scale role-playing knowledge QA benchmark with diverse speaker identities, aimed to evaluate the understanding and generation capabilities of speech-language models.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To benchmark speech-language models on role embodiment and knowledge-intensive spoken responses across various tasks.

data.source: Constructed from TriviaQA and synthesised using CosyVoice2 for diverse speaker roles.
data.annotation: Data generated through pretrained text-to-speech synthesis systems.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated as described in the experiments section based on model responses compared to ground truth.
methodology.interpretation: Higher EM and F1 scores indicate better model's ability to generate correct and contextually appropriate responses.
methodology.baseline_results: Best baseline models showed significant performance improvements, with an EM of 12.0 and F1 of 23.8 on RoleTriviaQA.
methodology.validation: Models validated by comparing their predictions against a benchmark set, tracking performance on both in-domain and out-of-domain queries.
